name: DlpServiceClient
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient
description: The DLP API is a service that allows clients to detect the presence of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and other privacy-sensitive data in user-supplied, unstructured data streams, like text blocks or images. The service also includes methods for sensitive data redaction and scheduling of data scans on Google Cloud Platform based data sets.

methods.name: result_path
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient.result_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified result resource name string.

params.name: credentials
params.description: Provides the means for authenticating requests made by the client. This parameter can be many types. A Google::Auth::Credentials uses a the properties of its represented keyfile for authenticating requests made by this client. A String will be treated as the path to the keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A Hash will be treated as the contents of a keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A GRPC::Core::Channel will be used to make calls through. A GRPC::Core::ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client. The channel credentials should already be composed with a GRPC::Core::CallCredentials object. A Proc will be used as an updater_proc for the Grpc channel. The proc transforms the metadata for requests, generally, to give OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

methods.name: inspect_content
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#inspect_content
methods.description: Finds potentially sensitive info in a list of strings. This method has limits on input size, processing time, and output size.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dlp/v2beta1"

dlp_service_client = Google::Cloud::Dlp::V2beta1.new
name = "EMAIL_ADDRESS"
info_types_element = { name: name }
info_types = [info_types_element]
inspect_config = { info_types: info_types }
type = "text/plain"
value = "My email is example@example.com."
items_element = { type: type, value: value }
items = [items_element]
response = dlp_service_client.inspect_content(inspect_config, items)

params.name: inspect_config
params.description: Configuration for the inspector. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::InspectConfig can also be provided.

params.name: items
params.description: The list of items to inspect. Items in a single request are considered “related” unless inspect_config.independent_inputs is true. Up to 100 are allowed per request. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::ContentItem can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: redact_content
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#redact_content
methods.description: Redacts potentially sensitive info from a list of strings. This method has limits on input size, processing time, and output size.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dlp/v2beta1"

dlp_service_client = Google::Cloud::Dlp::V2beta1.new
name = "EMAIL_ADDRESS"
info_types_element = { name: name }
info_types = [info_types_element]
inspect_config = { info_types: info_types }
type = "text/plain"
value = "My email is example@example.com."
items_element = { type: type, value: value }
items = [items_element]
response = dlp_service_client.redact_content(inspect_config, items)

params.name: inspect_config
params.description: Configuration for the inspector. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::InspectConfig can also be provided.

params.name: items
params.description: The list of items to inspect. Up to 100 are allowed per request. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::ContentItem can also be provided.

params.name: replace_configs
params.description: The strings to replace findings text findings with. Must specify at least one of these or one ImageRedactionConfig if redacting images. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::RedactContentRequest::ReplaceConfig can also be provided.

params.name: image_redaction_configs
params.description: The configuration for specifying what content to redact from images. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::RedactContentRequest::ImageRedactionConfig can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: deidentify_content
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#deidentify_content
methods.description: De-identifies potentially sensitive info from a list of strings. This method has limits on input size and output size.

params.name: deidentify_config
params.description: Configuration for the de-identification of the list of content items. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::DeidentifyConfig can also be provided.

params.name: inspect_config
params.description: Configuration for the inspector. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::InspectConfig can also be provided.

params.name: items
params.description: The list of items to inspect. Up to 100 are allowed per request. All items will be treated as text/*. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::ContentItem can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: analyze_data_source_risk
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#analyze_data_source_risk
methods.description: Schedules a job to compute risk analysis metrics over content in a Google Cloud Platform repository.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dlp/v2beta1"

dlp_service_client = Google::Cloud::Dlp::V2beta1.new
privacy_metric = {}
source_table = {}

# Register a callback during the method call.
operation = dlp_service_client.analyze_data_source_risk(privacy_metric, source_table) do |op|
  raise op.results.message if op.error?
  op_results = op.results
  # Process the results.

  metadata = op.metadata
  # Process the metadata.
end

# Or use the return value to register a callback.
operation.on_done do |op|
  raise op.results.message if op.error?
  op_results = op.results
  # Process the results.

  metadata = op.metadata
  # Process the metadata.
end

# Manually reload the operation.
operation.reload!

# Or block until the operation completes, triggering callbacks on
# completion.
operation.wait_until_done!

params.name: privacy_metric
params.description: Privacy metric to compute. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::PrivacyMetric can also be provided.

params.name: source_table
params.description: Input dataset to compute metrics over. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::BigQueryTable can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: create_inspect_operation
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#create_inspect_operation
methods.description: Schedules a job scanning content in a Google Cloud Platform data repository.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dlp/v2beta1"

dlp_service_client = Google::Cloud::Dlp::V2beta1.new
name = "EMAIL_ADDRESS"
info_types_element = { name: name }
info_types = [info_types_element]
inspect_config = { info_types: info_types }
url = "gs://example_bucket/example_file.png"
file_set = { url: url }
cloud_storage_options = { file_set: file_set }
storage_config = { cloud_storage_options: cloud_storage_options }
output_config = {}

# Register a callback during the method call.
operation = dlp_service_client.create_inspect_operation(inspect_config, storage_config, output_config) do |op|
  raise op.results.message if op.error?
  op_results = op.results
  # Process the results.

  metadata = op.metadata
  # Process the metadata.
end

# Or use the return value to register a callback.
operation.on_done do |op|
  raise op.results.message if op.error?
  op_results = op.results
  # Process the results.

  metadata = op.metadata
  # Process the metadata.
end

# Manually reload the operation.
operation.reload!

# Or block until the operation completes, triggering callbacks on
# completion.
operation.wait_until_done!

params.name: inspect_config
params.description: Configuration for the inspector. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::InspectConfig can also be provided.

params.name: storage_config
params.description: Specification of the data set to process. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::StorageConfig can also be provided.

params.name: output_config
params.description: Optional location to store findings. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::OutputStorageConfig can also be provided.

params.name: operation_config
params.description: Additional configuration settings for long running operations. A hash of the same form as Google::Privacy::Dlp::V2beta1::OperationConfig can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: list_inspect_findings
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#list_inspect_findings
methods.description: Returns list of results for given inspect operation result set id.

params.name: name
params.description:
Identifier of the results set returned as metadata of
the longrunning operation created by a call to InspectDataSource.
Should be in the format of +inspect/results/id+.

params.name: page_size
params.description:
Maximum number of results to return.
If 0, the implementation selects a reasonable value.

params.name: page_token
params.description:
The value returned by the last +ListInspectFindingsResponse+; indicates
that this is a continuation of a prior +ListInspectFindings+ call, and that
the system should return the next page of data.

params.name: filter
params.description:
Restricts findings to items that match. Supports info_type and likelihood.

Examples:

  • info_type=EMAIL_ADDRESS
  • info_type=PHONE_NUMBER,EMAIL_ADDRESS
  • likelihood=VERY_LIKELY
  • likelihood=VERY_LIKELY,LIKELY
  • info_type=EMAIL_ADDRESS,likelihood=VERY_LIKELY,LIKELY

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: list_info_types
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#list_info_types
methods.description: Returns sensitive information types for given category.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/dlp/v2beta1"

dlp_service_client = Google::Cloud::Dlp::V2beta1.new
category = "PII"
language_code = "en"
response = dlp_service_client.list_info_types(category, language_code)

params.name: category
params.description: Category name as returned by ListRootCategories.

params.name: language_code
params.description:
Optional BCP-47 language code for localized info type friendly
names. If omitted, or if localized strings are not available,
en-US strings will be returned.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: list_root_categories
title: Google
Cloud
Dlp
V2beta1
DlpServiceClient#list_root_categories
methods.description: Returns the list of root categories of sensitive information.

params.name: language_code
params.description:
Optional language code for localized friendly category names.
If omitted or if localized strings are not available,
en-US strings will be returned.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
